attributes.action: Start Accepting Visas from Ukrainians Citizens And Give Them Refuge
attributes.additional_details: We need to show that despite everything. We are here to support and help. Start having homes accessible to them. Help them! We cannot and shouldn't be only saying our condolences where we can make active decision to help them. So please consider this.
attributes.background: As the news have broken out, The Ukrainians Citizens can no longer consider their home safe to sleep in. Many other countries within Europe have soften the Visa Requirements however we have tighten it. We should help them, not block them away from refuge.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Help Ukrainian refugees and create a safe path for them to get to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609574

Draw up and implement a specific Ukrainian refugee strategy for the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609431

Grant Ukrainian citizens fleeing the war full rights to live and work in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609434
